akas from release info: Married at First Sight: The First Year (original title)
Matrimonio a prima vista USA un anno dopo Italy

1.title: Bucket List

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Doug and Jamie make a pre-baby bucket list and celebrate Jamie's birthday. Cortney teaches Jason how to do make-up for movie sets. Jason's best friend, Neph, finds love in Las Vegas.

2.title: Greener Grass

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Jamie and Doug hit a rocky path in their relationship. Cortney and Jason open up to each other about past pain. Neph and family prepare for his long distance girlfriend moving in.

3.title: Not Cool Jamie

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Jamie and Doug meet with Dr. Pepper about their recent bickering. Neph surprises Jasmine at the airport. Jason confides in Neph that he has half-siblings, but his best friend is not as supportive as he would like. Jamie has shocking news for Doug.

4.title: Wrong Path in Life

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Jamie tells Doug about having feelings for her ex-boyfriend, causing him to question the relationship. Neph has a birthday party where Jason and Cortney get to the bottom of how Jasmine is doing in New York City. Jason decides he wants to locate his estranged father.

5.title: This Is Something Serious

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Jamie takes Doug fencing for his pre-baby bucket list, but things turn serious when they argue on their way to her sister's party in upstate New York. Neph gets called out by Cortney for his lack of marriage plans even though Jasmine has moved to New York. And Jason expresses doubts about Cortney's motivations for a spontaneous vacation to North Carolina.

6.title: Hijinks

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Cortney shows Jason where she grew up in North Carolina in hopes he'll want to move there someday. Neph tries to help Jasmine acclimate to the New York lifestyle. Jamie struggles with Doug's absence and senses that he's avoiding her.

7.title: Slap in the Face

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Jamie sets up a meeting with Doug and her ex-boyfriend. Jasmine leaves New York. Cortney helps Jason uncover information about his estranged family and take the next step to find them.

8.title: Second Anniversary Edition

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Doug and Jamie meet Jason and Cortney for a look at their most romantic and cringe-worthy moments. They reveal their innermost thoughts through games and see previously unseen moments from their weddings thru present day.

9.title: Meet My Ex

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Jamie is hopeful Doug and her ex-boyfriend will get along. Neph reveals to Jasmine that he bought a house. Jason has a birthday surprise for Cortney.

10.title: You Need Therapy

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Jason gets a message from his estranged sister and plans a memorial art show for his mom. Doug struggles to show Jamie he cares about her family. Dr. Pepper calls out Jamie for not seeing a therapist about her troubled past.

11.title: Reunited at Last

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Jason meets his half sister. Jamie finally agrees to see a therapist who digs deep into her painful past. Cortney and Jason get into an argument that threatens their marriage.

12.title: Fighting Fire with Fire

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Cortney fears for Jason's safety at a big fire in Brooklyn, and later reveals to Jason that she has thrown her wedding band down the kitchen sink. Jamie sells her trailer in Cortland, NY.

13.title: Ghosts in the Closet

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Jamie and Doug go on a legit ghost hunt with all equipment. Dr. Pepper advises Cortney on controlling her rage. Jason surprises Cortney with a tropical trip!

1.title: Family Past and Present

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Jason and Cortney deal with the loss of his Mom. Jamie and Doug are excited to move to New Jersey but are surprised by an unwelcome family member.

2.title: Have Your Cake and Eat It Too

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Cortney finally reveals to Jason that she's losing her job. Jamie plans a surprise party for Doug's birthday. Monet is setup on a blind date.

3.title: Baby Fever

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Jamie continues to press Doug about having children. Jason risks his career by returning to the wrestling ring. Monet has a surprise date.

4.title: New York's Bravest

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Jason's graduation from the fire academy is finally here, and he realizes that Cortney's support is why he's made it this far. Meanwhile, Jamie's dreams of having a child are put on the back burner when Doug expresses his feelings about not being desired. Thanksgiving is right around the corner, and tensions arise when the couples begin to plan where to spend the holiday. Jamie talks with Monet about re-connecting with Vaughn.

5.title: We Found Love

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Jamie and Doug get together with Cortney and Jason for a date night in the city. The newlyweds reminisce about their favorite romantic memories, as they view scenes from their first year of marriage. They also pass along fun tips about how to keep the romance alive after you walk down the aisle.

6.title: Turkey Days

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Jason and Cortney continue arguing over their Thanksgiving plans. With Jason working, will Cortney spend the day by herself? Or will she fly home to North Carolina, leaving Jason alone the whole holiday weekend? Jamie and Doug invite both sides of their families to come to their home for a new holiday tradition. When Jamie's mom doesn't show up, Jamie worries and tries to get in touch with her. Monet's divorce is finalized. Doug reaches out to Vaughn.

7.title: Naughty or Nice

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Cortney and Jason have had some issues as of late, so maybe a risqué Christmas present will get them back on the same page. But with it being Jason's first Christmas without his mom, will the pressure of the holiday be too much? Meanwhile, Doug has a big Christmas surprise for Jamie. But when they visit Jamie's family for the holiday, bitter feelings threaten to spoil it. Monet meets with her friend, Klay, for a little guy advice. Maybe a little love is in store for the new year.

8.title: What Happens in Vegas

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Jason and Cortney try to rebound from their fight with a trip to Las Vegas to celebrate the bachelor and bachelorette parties they never had since they met at the altar. Monet spends New Years Eve with a new romantic interest. Meanwhile Doug looks at diamond rings in preparation for the proposal he never got to make to Jamie.

9.title: All Shook Up

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: With Jason and Cortney in Las Vegas, a wedding is in the works. There's so much to do and so little time to do it. But after opening up about her recent struggles, will Cortney decide to move back to North Carolina instead? Meanwhile, Monet meets with Jamie to talk about her new love interest, Deunta, and Doug has cold feet when it comes to proposing to Jamie. With Jamie moving forward with a new career, is now even the right time?

imdb.title: Married at First Sight: The First Year
plot: Follows the lives of Cortney and Jason, and Doug and Jamie from Married at First Sight.
